overview: Shaggydog started producing beautiful songs and music from a small town in Yogyakarta called Sayidan. Through ups and down, they managed to get themselves to perform and explored foreign countries. In Sayidan, they formed a family; in Yogyakarta they created their mind pieces. When they are on the stage, they will invite you to dance â€“and raise your glass once again.
title: Berdansa bersama Shaggydog
